scripts:
set properties on /content/dam/assignment/jcr:content
  set cq:conf{String} to /conf/assignment
  set jcr:title{String} to "Assignment"
end

set principal ACL for workflow-service-user
	allow jcr:read, jcr:write, jcr:modifyProperties, jcr:removeNode, jcr:addChildNodes on /content
	allow jcr:read, jcr:write, jcr:modifyProperties, jcr:removeNode, jcr:addChildNodes on /var
	allow jcr:read, jcr:write, jcr:modifyProperties, jcr:removeNode, jcr:addChildNodes on /conf
end
